slide.title: Hello!
slide.bullet: This is a simple 'OPT' demo presentation
OPT is a simple presentation program built with Clutter by folks at OH.
Presentations are built with simple XML files.
Press any key to go on...

slide.title: Navigating with OPT.
slide.bullet: Any key to advance to next slide.
'r' or left arrow to go back.
You can also use mouse buttons.

slide.title: Features 2
Thats all folks.
slide.bullet: Dont forget to check the demo.xml source for making your own presentations.
And send patches to improve OPT further!
